type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.query.ArtifactResolutionQuery

method.name: execute
method.description: Actually execute the query, returning a query result. Note that #withArtifacts(Class, Class[]) must be called before executing the query.

method.name: forComponents
method.description:
Specifies the set of components to include in the result.
param:componentIds The identifiers of the components to be queried.

method.name: forComponents
method.description:
Specifies the set of components to include in the result.
param:componentIds The identifiers of the components to be queried.

method.name: withArtifacts
method.description:
Defines the type of component that is expected in the result, and the artifacts to retrieve for components of this type. Presently, only a single component type and set of artifacts is permitted.
param:componentType The expected type of the component.
param:artifactTypes The artifacts to retrieve for the queried components.
